properties.Name: CustomerStatusType
properties.Description:
Identifies whether a customer is a current or prospective customer.

CURRENT CUSTOMER
A current customer has purchased products or services and is considered a 'current' customer as defined by the company. 

PROSPECTIVE CUSTOMER
A prospective customer has the potential to be a consumer or customer of a product or service based on the criteria that they have the financial ability, desire to acquire products or services and are located where those products and services can be provided.

Columns.Name: CustomerStatusTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Customer Status Type.

Columns.Name: CustomerStatusTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Customer Status Type.

Columns.Name: CustomerStatusTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Customer Status Type.
